font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 28.56%;top: 64.78%;width: 10.00%;height: 2.28%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
最初は
人型の変身だけ
だったけど、
今は動物にも
なれる!
style: font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81.33%;top: 46.15%;width: 14.36%;height: 17.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
それじゃ
テストの時は
人型しか
変身できな
かったの?
style: font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.22%;top: 67.14%;width: 13.51%;height: 12.19%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.46%;top: 66.27%;width: 12.66%;height: 8.73%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
僕に
とってはね
でもそれが
普通って
聞いた
style: font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 64.73%;top: 64.39%;width: 13.51%;height: 12.58%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
結局
テストは
能力で
内容が違う
からね
